actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Budget.
Reported to House from the Committee on the Budget, H. Rept. 94-608.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #693 (225-191).
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Measure passed Senate, amended, in lieu of S. Con. Res. 76, roll call #526 (69-23).
Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 94-698.
Conference report filed in Senate, S. Rept. 94-519.
Senate agreed to conference report, roll call #579 (74-19).
House agreed to conference report, roll call #774 (189-187).

official_title: Concurrent resolution revising the congressional budget for the U.S. Government for the fiscal year 1976, and directing certain reconciliation action.

summary.text: (Conference report filed in House, H. Rept 94-698) States the determination of the Congress, pursuant to the Congressional Budget Act, that for the fiscal year beginning July 1, 1975: (1) the appropriate total budget authority is $374,900,000,000; (2) the appropriate new budget authority is $408,000,000,000; (3) the appropriate budget deficit is $74,100,000,000; (4) the recommended revenues are $300,800,000,000 (and legislation shall be submitted to each House to decrease revenues by $6,400,000,000; and (5) the appropriate public debt is $622,600,000,000. Sets forth appropriate amounts for such categories for the period from July 1, 1976, through September 30, 1976.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution revising the congressional budget for the U.S. Government for the fiscal year 1976, and directing certain reconciliation action.
